Mercury::BundleEventHandler

Mercury::BundleEventHandler Class Reference
[Mercury]

This class declares an interface for receiving notifications when a bundle is processed. More...

#include <interfaces.hpp>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

virtual ~BundleEventHandler ()
virtual void onBundleStarted (Channel *pChannel)
 This method is called when the bundle has started processing, before any of its messages are delivered.
virtual void onBundleFinished (Channel *pChannel)
 This method is called after all messages in a bundle have been delivered.

Detailed Description

This class declares an interface for receiving notifications when a bundle is processed.

This method is called after all messages in a bundle have been delivered.

virtual void Mercury::BundleEventHandler::onBundleStarted ( Channel *  pChannel  )  [inline, virtual]

This method is called when the bundle has started processing, before any of its messages are delivered.
